特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: This course is basically a seminar-style one.  First, students study designated parts of written and spoken texts beforehand, and then present their interpretation of each sentence in context during the class.  The teacher makes some comments on their interpretations and explains the uses of and meanings of words and phrases, the difference between written and spoken English, phonetic features and so on, not to mention how to interpret each sentence in context.  Students need to take notes of them in class.
